figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses flow chart.

claims.sentence: We searched these 5 databases (Figure 1) for publications from the last decade (2014-2023) to align with recent advancements in treating patients regardless of age and updated treatment guidelines.
